name: Rooby

ability.name: Tiny Spark
ability.description: While in team, increases attack power of Fire Pals.

description: Wild Rooby surprisingly never get sick. Eating one piece of charcoal a day, made by burning a branch, is the secret to its eternal health.

skills.name: Ignis Blast
skills.description: Hurls a ball of fire straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Power Shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: Spirit Fire
skills.description: Shoots fireballs towards an enemy. The fireballs explode after a short distance, generating smaller fireballs that spread forward.

skills.name: Flare Arrow
skills.description: Fires three flaming arrows in succession that home in on an enemy.

skills.name: Flare Storm
skills.description: Generates two flaming tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: Ignis Rage
skills.description: Energizes the surrounding ground, causing it to explode after a set amount of time.

skills.name: Fire Ball
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of flame and hurls it at an enemy. The ball explodes over a wide area upon impact.
